text: namut (nabiyē!) obagē deviyan itāmat kṣamā karanneku hā dayābaravantayeku vaśayenda siṭinnēya. ovun karana (napuru) vipathi hētuven ohu (evele evelēma) ovunva allā gatahot, metek ovunva anivāryayenma dan̆ḍuvam kara æta. ehet (ovunṭa dan̆ḍuvam kirīmaṭa) ovunṭa ek niyamita kālayak æta. in pasuva ovunṭa bērīmaṭa mārgayak dakinnē næta
